about_the_game:
Planes of Fear is an intense psychological horror game and the ultimate test of courage for you and your friends! In this game, you’ll dive into different dimensions of fear—perfect for a daring party challenge or a gripping single-player experience. In a claustrophobic first-person perspective, you’ll explore a constantly shifting nightmare world that drags you deeper into the abyss of your darkest fears with every step.

The goal is simple: Who can last the longest? Each level presents a terrifying new challenge inspired by a specific phobia. Only the bravest players will dare to go further, and every round will push your endurance to its limits.

Gameplay Features:

  • Diverse Levels of Fear: Each level is inspired by a specific phobia, challenging you on a psychological level. Whether it’s heights, darkness, or tight spaces—there’s something to get under everyone’s skin.

  • Tailored Mechanics: Every level introduces unique, intuitive mechanics that match the phobia in play. Sometimes you’ll run for your life, other times you’ll have to defend yourself. Each mechanic is designed to make every level as intense as possible—no one gets to sit back and relax.

  • Couch Multiplayer Mode: Who has the nerves of steel to last the longest? In local multiplayer mode, you’ll take turns facing the horrors, but after each completed level, the game randomly selects the next player. This keeps the tension high—no one knows when they’ll be up next! Expect thrills, screams, and a whole lot of adrenaline.

  • Immersive Sound Design: Whispering voices, eerie footsteps, haunting melodies—the sound design amplifies the tension and ensures chills on every level.

Are you ready to walk the path of fear and find out who can endure the longest?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may include content that is not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing in a work environment: intense violence, gore, and generally mature content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11-compatible sound card

In couch multiplayer mode, the game randomly selects the next player after each level. How long can you endure the terror?
